title: Education & Events
content: Hubs host seminars, lectures, and events that engage students in critical discussions about technology and society. We create spaces for informed dialogue about the societal impacts of emerging technologies.

title: Policy Engagement
content: We give youth a voice in Australian policy issues by running tech policy engagement programs and publishing policy recommendations that reflect our lived experience.

title: Community Building
content: Hubs operate as societies or clubs within universities, bringing together students who care about how technologies are designed and regulated. Join a community of like-minded peers.
